hugo-absURL.description: `absURL` creates an absolute URL based on the configured baseURL

hugo-anchorize.description: `anchorize` sanitizes a string the same way as Blackfriday does for markdown headers

hugo-relURL.description: `relURL` prepends the relative URL according to a pageâ€™s position in the project directory structure

hugo-title.description: `title` Converts all characters in the provided string to title case
